content: So the biggest step there was, it's a -- when the transaction closed last year, we had legacy letters of credit outstanding with our former agent bank that we cash collateralized at close as a first step to then transitioning those letters of credit onto the revolver or under the Term Loan C. So we posted a certain amount of cash with that counterparty that shows up on the Q4 balance sheet and about $110 million of that represented -- representing that collateral backstop.
